snippet: According to multiple news media reports, Brady and the Patriots agreed to a two-year extension that will significantly reduce his salary cap hit for 2016.
abstract: New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady signs two-year contract extension with team.
lead_paragraph: According to multiple news media reports, Brady and the Patriots agreed to a two-year extension that will significantly reduce his salary cap hit for 2016.

headline.main: Tom Brady Reportedly Agrees to Extension
